replies.body:
Honestly excited to see where they take this. I enjoy they are bringing more champs that fit into the lore or other champions backstories. Can't wait for the next darkins, the frozen watchers, more people from Jinxes gang in Zaun. They could build a champion off anything realistically and it's great!

Keep up the good work Riot!

Jinx's gang???
don't you mean Ekko's
nah he means jinx's gang lmfao{{champion:222}}
Good to see more community oriented stuff being pushed recently over purchasable content, would be super cool to see more stuff like this released for both new and existing champs.

They've brought out characters that fit into lore before, but I love that this is a character that already existed, that they're bringing to the rift! it's very exciting. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
